channel.title: Continuation of the Matrix Project!
channel.description:
As many of you know recently the developer of matrix dragonkk has quit hosting private servers and released the amazing matrix 718/723 source/client.
As you may have expect any special features that you would expect such as QBD, Fight Kiln, Commands, Crucible etc.. came crippled.
So after 2 hours of development i am proud to say that all bosses are now working properly and players can only spawn a limited range of items the rest must be earned.
Fixed the crucible and some missing map-data.
Working on Squeal of Fortune (25% done)
Full Donor/Voting /Systems!
http://mephobia.goodluckwith.us
I went ahead and released the server for players to play during its development.
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/8RxKDZ.png[/img]
